welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kota Kinabalu, a city known for its stunning sunsets, vibrant markets, and rich cultural heritage. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that this charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Cafe De Vie
restaurants.description: Cafe De Vie is a café located in Kota Kinabalu.
restaurants.address: Lot-0-6, Ground Floor, Block D, Lorong Metro 3 (Lorong Metro 3,), 88450 Kota Kinabalu, Sabah

restaurants.name: Narita Tom Yam
restaurants.description: Narita Tom Yam is a malay restaurant located in Kota Kinabalu.

restaurants.address: 10C Iramanis Centre, Ruang Iramanis (Jalan Lintas), 88450 Kota Kinabalu, Sabah

restaurants.name: Ho Kee Hainanese Chicken Rice 何记(文昌)正宗海南鸡饭
